about_the_game:
Step into the twisted world of Bussy Master: Halloween 2024, where passion meets terror. Unleash your desires as you encounter irresistible demons, and sultry vampires. But beware, for the night is filled with more than just the undead— sinister evil clowns, mysterious masked killers and more all await to draw you into their dark embrace. This Halloween, surrender to the allure of the supernatural and let your deepest fantasies come to life.

🧩 Puzzle Features:

  • Challenge your mind with two classic puzzle styles: eerie swapping and spooky rotating. Develop clever strategies to reveal the secrets of the hauntingly hot Halloween characters!

🖼️ Sensual Gallery:

  • Explore the seductive charm of each Halloween-themed character effortlessly. Dive into the temptation of each one through a user-friendly gallery interface.

❤️ Favorites System:

  • Select your most cherished characters for swift access and succumb to their irresistible allure!

🔥 Meet the Sexy Characters:

  • Unlock the hidden desires of 130+ captivating characters, each radiating their own unique, spooky allure! From the seductive to the sinister, there's a creature to captivate every desire.

📷 Immersive Visuals:

  • Immerse yourself in the spooky atmosphere of Halloween with stunning 5K detail. Let the wide array of sexy and scary characters enchant your senses!

🎵 Enchanting Soundtrack:

  • Immerse yourself in eerie melodies. Let the haunting music set the mood for your spooky adventures!

⚙️ Technical Customization:

  • Personalize your gaming experience to your wildest desires. Adjust settings like resolution, fullscreen mode, framerate, and more. Adapt to the temptations and delights that lie ahead!

Embark on a thrilling journey through the spooky world of Bussy Master: Halloween 2024, where your puzzle-solving skills reveal the spectral charm of the sexy Halloween creatures!

All characters depicted are adults (21+).

content_descriptors.notes: Bussy Master: Halloween 2024 features graphic sexual content, including nudity, sexual acts, genitalia, masturbation, bodily fluids, and BDSM themes. The game’s settings can be dark and intense, featuring locations like graveyards, haunted woods, burning houses and more. Some scenes may depict characters with cuts, blood, or burns, either on the characters themselves or within the environment (including skeletons and bones). All sexual encounters involve consenting adult characters, reflecting a diverse range of identities and appearances. All characters are adults (21+).

name: Bussy Master: Halloween 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for audio
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Surrender to the allure of Bussy Master: Halloween 2024! Encounter irresistible demons, sultry vampires, sinister evil clowns, mysterious masked killers and lots more! Let your deepest fantasies awaken in this thrilling puzzle adventure. 🎃🧩
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
